page.title: 11ST MAWGAN YOUTH CLUB
page.content: St Mawgan youth club started in 198O. The original leaders were John Wharry and Sarah Conibear. In 1983 Hilary Conibear and Sarah Wailes replaced them. Until 1984 the youth club met in the church hall, but while the church hall is being improved we meet in Mawgan Porth hall. We meet every Friday at 7.3O until 1Opm from September to June. We meet at the hall for 2 weeks, and go out for the 3rd.Activities include table tennis, darts, pool, swingball, quiz's, games and disco's. We visit Polkyth leisure centre, St Austell for swimming, squash and the St Eval 1O pin bowling alley. We've taken part in a T.V game "thats my dog" and represented Cornwall in a tabletennis competition. Membership is open from 11 to 2O years. There is an adult and members committee. Olivia Conibear.
